column5: Well I've got a 7.0' Quantum Superlite PT rod that I shortened by an inch or so. I'm hoping that I can take it somewhere and get the second line guide removed and add a tip guide. I was rushing around before work one morning trying to get some rods and tackle ready for a last minute outing for my son. What a way to start the day. Does anyone know someone in the St. Catharines to Oakville region that can do this?
Most tackle shops can probably do it.  I'm in Guelph, and can do it if you can't find anyone closer.
If east Hamilton is convenient shoot me a PM.
Spiel is probably your man - I suspect he may even have the tip you need laying around...  My spare parts box is growing, but I imagine Spiel has a spare parts warehouse!
Thanks Bud.  No intention to undermine your offer, just thought I might be a little handier given the OP's location.

If that doesn't work out,  I probably have 100+ tips on hand with tube sizes between size 4.5 and and 7.  Most rings are 6 mm but there are some 5's, 7's and a few other sizes.    ...all different brands, ring types, and frame metals.
